pMaterial Class Reference

Class for describing a shape's surface properties. More...

List of all members.

Public Attributes

  • int flags
    Flags, a combination of the bits defined by the enum pMaterialFlag

    • Default: 0.

  • float dynamicFriction
    Coefficient of dynamic friction. If set to greater than staticFriction,
    the effective value of staticFriction will be increased to match. if flags & MF_Anisotropic is set, then this value is used for the primary direction of anisotropy (U axis)

    • Range: [0,+inf)
    • Default: [0).

  • float staticFriction
    Coefficient of static friction. If flags & MF_Anisotropic is set,
    then this value is used for the primary direction of anisotropy (U axis).
  • float restitution
    Coefficient of restitution. Makes the object bounce as little as possible, higher values up to 1.0 result in more bounce. Note that values close to or above 1 may cause stability problems and/or increasing energy.

    • Range: [0,1)
    • Default: [0).

  • float dynamicFrictionV
    Anisotropic dynamic friction coefficient for along the secondary (V) axis of anisotropy. This is only used if flags & MF_Anisotropic is set.

    • Range: [0,inf)
    • Default: [0).

  • float staticFrictionV
    Anisotropic static friction coefficient for along the secondary (V) axis of anisotropy. This is only used if flags & MF_Anisotropic is set.

    • Range: [0,inf)
    • Default: [0).

  • CombineMode frictionCombineMode
    Friction combine mode. See the enum CombineMode .

    • Range: [CombineMode)
    • Default: [CM_Average).

  • CombineMode restitutionCombineMode
    Restitution combine mode. See the enum CombineMode .

    • Range: [CombineMode)
    • Default: [CM_Average).

  • VxVector dirOfAnisotropy
    shape space direction (unit vector) of anisotropy. This is only used if flags & MF_Anisotropic is set.

    • Range: [vector)
    • Default: [1.0f,0.0f,0.0f)

  • const char * name
    unique name of the material
  • int xmlLinkID
    Enumeration to identify a material setup from PhysicDefaults.xml. Is being populated automatically on reset.

    • Range: [0,Number of material setups in xml file)
    • Default: [NONE).

Detailed Description

Class for describing a shape's surface properties.

Member Data Documentation

int pMaterial::flags

Flags, a combination of the bits defined by the enum pMaterialFlag

  • Default: 0.

See also:
MaterialFlags
float pMaterial::dynamicFriction

Coefficient of dynamic friction. If set to greater than staticFriction,
the effective value of staticFriction will be increased to match. if flags & MF_Anisotropic is set, then this value is used for the primary direction of anisotropy (U axis)

  • Range: [0,+inf)
  • Default: [0).

float pMaterial::staticFriction

Coefficient of static friction. If flags & MF_Anisotropic is set,
then this value is used for the primary direction of anisotropy (U axis).

float pMaterial::restitution

Coefficient of restitution. Makes the object bounce as little as possible, higher values up to 1.0 result in more bounce. Note that values close to or above 1 may cause stability problems and/or increasing energy.

  • Range: [0,1)
  • Default: [0).

float pMaterial::dynamicFrictionV

Anisotropic dynamic friction coefficient for along the secondary (V) axis of anisotropy. This is only used if flags & MF_Anisotropic is set.

  • Range: [0,inf)
  • Default: [0).

float pMaterial::staticFrictionV

Anisotropic static friction coefficient for along the secondary (V) axis of anisotropy. This is only used if flags & MF_Anisotropic is set.

  • Range: [0,inf)
  • Default: [0).

CombineMode pMaterial::frictionCombineMode

Friction combine mode. See the enum CombineMode .

  • Range: [CombineMode)
  • Default: [CM_Average).

CombineMode pMaterial::restitutionCombineMode

Restitution combine mode. See the enum CombineMode .

  • Range: [CombineMode)
  • Default: [CM_Average).

VxVector pMaterial::dirOfAnisotropy

shape space direction (unit vector) of anisotropy. This is only used if flags & MF_Anisotropic is set.

  • Range: [vector)
  • Default: [1.0f,0.0f,0.0f)

const char* pMaterial::name

unique name of the material

int pMaterial::xmlLinkID

Enumeration to identify a material setup from PhysicDefaults.xml. Is being populated automatically on reset.

  • Range: [0,Number of material setups in xml file)
  • Default: [NONE).
